roleset.name: make feel better

example.name: all args
example.text: Yet Jack's the one who can remember every dive they ever played, and when, and he dutifully shows up for work night after night (he consoles himself with booze and by showing up at the last minute).

example.name: Args 0 & 1
example.text: Her consolation of the crying child consisted of treating him to a chocolate sundae.

example.name: ARG1
example.text: That 's of little consolation to the families who today hear the first and what may be the final words of the doomed crew of the `` Kursk .
example.arg: to the families who today hear the first and what may be the final words of the doomed crew of the `` Kursk

example.name: Args 1 & 2
example.text: Each weekend is kicked off by picking out my consolation bottle of wine with the prettiest label I can find.
example.arg: bottle of wine with the prettiest label I can find.

roleset.note: CONSOLE-V NOTES: Based on sentences in wsj. Member of VNcls amuse-31.1. (from console.01-v)
CONSOLATION-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry console.01, OntoNotes grouping consolation-n sense 1; maps to VN class amuse-31.1. Framed by Claire. (from consolation.01-n)
